ygData.subject: Re: Hunting 46-50
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, it is at the bottom of Blackburrow and it looks like a giant chess pawn (sorta)... that or one of those old fashion light posts with the globe light on
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, it is at the bottom of Blackburrow and it looks like a giant
chess pawn (sorta)... that or one of those old fashion light posts
with the globe light on top, only the "light globe" is a round
sphere that appears to be rock. Click on it and you appear in
Jagged Pine. Fair warning though... when you port in, you are in an
unfriendly area to those who are on bad faction in SureFall, so you
can port in, but go in invis or be prepared to run upon zone in.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "mlockridge01" <MLockridge01@c...>
wrote:
> Wow. Never heard of that.
>
> Barto
>

<melanie_6602@y...>
